Class DeviceList

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ailis.usb4java.libusb.DeviceList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Device>

    public final class DeviceList
extends Object
implements Iterable<Device>
    List of devices as returned by LibUsb.getDeviceList(Context, DeviceList).
    Author:
    Klaus Reimer (k@ailis.de)
